RL-KG’s documentation

RL-KG is an end-to-end python framework aimed at Knowledge Graph completion by leveraging in reinforcement learning techonology. It recieves any dataset and generates trained agents with several embedding representations deploys an API for consulting the results, generates visualization tools and more…
